appDesc.message: Capture visual bugs and report it to redmine.

connectionApiKeyHint.message: The credentials are used only to retrieve the api key from Redmine. The api key is used for every further request. The key is stored encrypted in the browser's synchronized storage.

gettingStarted1.message: Afterwards you have to choose a name for the new template.

gettingStarted2.message: As soon as your template has been created, click the reload button below or open a new BugShot window.

gettingStartedRedmine1.message: Before you can create a Redmine issue, we have to create a template. To create an template, choose an issue from your Redmine instance as reference. Then click

gettingStartedEasyRedmine1.message: Before you can create a EasyRedmine issue, we have to create a template. To create an template, choose an issue from your EasyRedmine instance as reference. Then click
